title: What does the grey chest mean
body: What does the grey chest when you hover over the champion in the champion screen in profile mean? Does it mean you can earn a chest for them?

replies.body:
The grey chest means that you have not yet gotten a chest with that champion this season.

Once you do, it turns gold and gives the champion icon a gold border. That means you can no longer get a chest with them for the rest of the season.

It means you have already earned you're chest with that champion and you wont be able to earn another chest with them for another 12 months since you got the chest. (1 chest earned per champion per player every 12 months).
